titleStmt.title: Die Mercurii: 5⁰ Maii. 1641. It is this day ordered by the House of Commons now assembled in Parliament ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings Most Excellent Majestie: And by the assignes of John Bill.,

notesStmt.note: A declaration against the Roman Catholic Church.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
